title: ROMCON: Who the F**k is Jason Porter?
overview: ROMCON: Who the F**k is Jason Porter? exposes the dark side of dating in one of North America's largest cities. The series follows successful Toronto real estate broker Heather Rovet as she discovers her perfect three-year romance with "Jace" was nothing but a scam. Her live-in boyfriend was actually Jason Porter, a convicted criminal with a history of romantic deception. As Heather discovers and connects with other victims she transforms from heartbroken lover to determined investigator. Heather risks everything to expose his pattern of manipulation and seek justice.Â
